info.name: Waverly
info.title: Waverly
info.blurb: Waverly is a neighborhood staple that never closes, and its massive menu has everything you're looking for in a diner and a little more.
info.intro: Just around the corner from Washington Square is this unassuming 24/7 diner with a couple of surprises. Waverly, or Waverly Restaurant, is a traditional American diner with a menu that has a noticeably Greek influence. It's a twenty-four seven diner that seems to be a late night favorite for this neighborhood. It’s also one of the cleanest and strangest diners I’ve ever been to.
